title: The Haunting Heist
tagline: Stealing from spirits? What could go ghoul?
mpaa_rating_content: Contains mild action, thematic elements, and some spooky scenes
critic_review: Cleverly blending humor with a touch of the supernatural, 'The Haunting Heist' is a delightful romp that charms audiences of all ages. Anthony Hop-scone's performance is eerily endearing, while Wong Kar-waitail's direction ensures the pacing is as lively as its undead cast. It's a spirited adventure with just enough scares to tickle the funny bone without haunting viewers' dreams.
description: In the eeriest apartment building of the 1910s, lawyer-turned-supernatural hunter Lee Wenlong partners with the cunning vampire, Anthony Hop-scone, for a heist with a ghostly twist. Amidst the chaos of World War I, they're on a mission to retrieve a cursed treasure before it falls into the wrong hands—or claws. Directed by Wong Kar-waitail, 'The Haunting Heist' is a spook-tacular caper where the stakes are supernatural and laughter is the best defense against the undead.
object_prompt: Create a simple and Playful title, short and simple Humorous tagline, and description teaser of a MPAA PG rated movie. The movie stars Anthony Hop-scone and is Directed by Wong Kar-waitail. Located at Residential Area (Apartment Building/House) of a Supernatural Short Film film where Politician/Lawyer and Supernatural Hunter (Vampire/Werewolf/Zombie/Monster) are the main characters. The movie is about a Heist/Caper during World War I. make the character names of Asian origin. Provide what the movie contains which is the reason for the rating. The title, tagline and description should be consistent with the rating of the movie. Provide a critic score between 1 and 10 as critic_score. Provide a critic review as critic_review. Output result as json, title as the title property, tagline as the tagline property, rating as mpaa_rating, rating reason as rating_content, assign it a single word genre as genre, description as the description property.
image_prompt: Visualize an old, eerie 1910s apartment building with a supernatural aura under the dim glow of a street lamp. A ghostly silhouette hovers near a hidden treasure, with ethereal wisps and spectral light hinting at otherworldly presences. A mysterious, charming vampire with a sly grin stands ready beside a focused, rugged supernatural hunter, both preparing for their ghostly heist. The scene is tinged with a touch of humor and a vintage caper feel, avoiding any direct representation of violence or explicit content.
